## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vfs/file">File</a> system that tracks the number of calls to the underlying file system.

This is particularly useful when wrapped around <code>RealFileSystem</code> to add lightweight tracking of expensive syscalls.

Definition at line 1151 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/virtualfilesystem-h">VirtualFileSystem.h</a>.
